title: Birthdays
description: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.

title: Holidays and Seasons
description: May the sweetest cake of Christmas brings lots of sweetness in your life, bring you all together for a great celebration filled with lots of joy and happiness!

title: Special Occasions
description: Take the broken pieces of your life, bake a master cake out of it. Don't stand still like a lake; keep flowing like a stream!

title: Cupcakes
description: Cupcakes - when you want to watch your weight, but still feel the pride that comes with eating an entire cake.

title: Macaroons
description: It is the sweet simple things in life which are the real ones after all!
